backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining types (SubjectScores, AcademicEntry, CodingChallenge, etc.) and implementing academic tracking, board exam results, coding challenges/attempts, user profiles, and access control with role-based permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing JSON summaries of all frontend components, hooks, and configuration files describing their functionality and relationships.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags, title, and script tag loading the React application from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication flow, profile setup, module navigation (academic/coding/users/data), admin detection, and rendering appropriate views based on auth state.
frontend/src/components/AcademicModule.t: Container component with three-tab interface (Add Marks, View Progress, Subject Analysis) that switches to Progress View after successful mark submission.
frontend/src/components/AddMarksForm.tsx: Form for entering academic marks with grade/term selection, stream/subgroup configuration for grades 11-12, dynamic subject inputs with validation using maxMarks utilities, and Grade 10 board exam handling with AI substitution.
frontend/src/components/CodingEditor.tsx: Python code editor component with challenge selection, Pyodide-based execution, output display, and functionality to save attempts with optional scoring.
frontend/src/components/CodingHistory.ts: Displays a user's coding attempt history with accordion-style expandable items showing challenge titles, timestamps, scores, code snippets, and feedback in a scrollable card interface.
frontend/src/components/CodingModule.tsx: Main container component for the Python coding practice section with tabs to switch between the code editor and coding history views.
frontend/src/components/DataManagement.t: Provides data export (JSON/CSV) and import functionality for academic entries and coding attempts, with drag-and-drop file upload and admin-only access controls.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright notice and attribution to caffeine.ai with an animated heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Navigation header with module switcher (Academic/Coding/Data/Users), theme toggle, and Internet Identity authentication controls.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: First-time user profile setup form that prompts for and saves the user's name to complete profile creation.
frontend/src/components/ProgressView.tsx: Displays academic progress with sortable tables, statistics cards, bar/line charts showing term percentages, grade aggregates, and board exam results.
frontend/src/components/SubjectAnalysisV: React component that displays subject-wise academic performance analysis with grade filtering, statistics table, and bar charts showing average, highest, and lowest marks per subject.
frontend/src/components/UserManagement.t: Admin component for assigning user roles (user/admin) to principals via a form that takes Principal ID and role selection.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/usePyodide.ts: React hook that loads and manages Pyodide (Python runtime in browser), providing a function to execute Python code and capture stdout/stderr output.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including user profiles, academic entries, board exam results, coding challenges, and admin operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining color schemes for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/lib/boardExam.ts: Provides utilities for Grade 10 board exam calculations, including AI substitution logic where AI marks can replace the lowest of Math/Science/Social if it improves the total, returning board exam totals out of 500 max marks.
frontend/src/lib/maxMarks.ts: Defines grade-wise maximum marks rules for all subjects (regular, Computer, AI) across grades 1-12, including term entries and board exams, with functions to retrieve max marks configurations and calculate term totals.
frontend/src/lib/percent.ts: Provides utility functions for percentage calculations including clamping values to 0-100 range, formatting percentages, and calculating percentages from marks and max marks.
frontend/src/lib/subjectAnalysis.ts: Computes subject-wise statistics (average, highest, lowest, count) from academic entries by calculating percentages using grade-appropriate max marks and aggregating data across all entries per subject.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, rendering the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, extended theme properties including sidebar colors, border radius variables, animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document indicating pending feature requests to add raw-marks percentage tables for grades 9-12 across terms and frequency-polygon charts for combined percentage distribution visualization.
